main event: An observer sighted a cylindrical, metallic object hovering in the sky near Selma, California on August 9, 1968.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 20 seconds before it disappeared heading west,The observer's sister, who was 11 years old, also witnessed the sighting,The object appeared to be rotating and was about twice the size of a B-52 bomber,It made no visible sound and moved in a zig-zag course at high speed,The observer was 18 years old and a sophomore at Selma High School.
witness description: The observer is an 18-year-old male and his 11-year-old sister.
